name: Eternal Waves
description:
Eternal Waves is an Arcade-Game with never ending Enemy-Waves.

Get the best Highscore by playing the different levels, using items and destroying one wave after another.

I developed this little game as my first ever game-project. I learned alot through the experience and hope you´ll enjoy it.

Install Instructions:
  1. Download the .zip file
  2. Right click on the folder > Extract 
  3. Open folder and double click EternalWaves.exe

-HAVE FUN PLAYING-
